import React from 'react' import women from '../assets/women.jpeg'; import men from '../assets/men.jpeg'; import jwelery from '../assets/jwelery.jpeg'; import electronic from '../assets/electronic.jpeg'; import { Footer, Navbar } from "../components"; const AboutPage = () => { return ( <>

About Us

We bring you the coolest and most innovative products that will make you the envy of all your friends! We've got everything from tech gadgets that will blow your mind to health and fitness products that will help you get in the best shape of your life, and even household items that are so useful you'll wonder how you ever lived without them.
So, what are you waiting for? Come check out our dropshipping store and see what all the fuss is about.

Our Products

Mens's Clothing
Women's Clothing
Jewelery
Electronics
) } export default AboutPage
